dialogue.speaker: Protagonist
dialogue.text: Welcome to the land of Eridoria, a mystical realm of wonder and danger.

dialogue.speaker: Guide
dialogue.text: Greetings traveler. I see you're new here. What brings you to our world?

dialogue.speaker: Protagonist
dialogue.text: I'm just a curious adventurer looking for excitement and treasure.

dialogue.speaker: Guide
dialogue.text: Be careful what you wish for. Eridoria is full of hidden perils and ancient secrets waiting to be uncovered.
